issues.description: The solution’s implementation of getTotalNumberOfStudents() returns a StudentCount object (and introduces a StudentCount class), but the problem’s UML diagram and instructions specify that getTotalNumberOfStudents() should return an int. This return‐type mismatch and the unexpected auxiliary class will confuse students and prevent them from following the intended design.
issues.suggested_fix: Modify getTotalNumberOfStudents() in the solution to return an int (sum of inscribed and guest students) and remove the StudentCount class, or alternatively update the problem statement and template to define and explain the StudentCount class and its use in the UML.
